mmo-rpg-unity
Table of Contents

Class Entity

Namespace
Entities
Assembly
Assembly-CSharp.dll

Represents an abstract entity that can be moved and can attack. Requires a UnityEngine.SpriteRenderer, UnityEngine.U2D.Animation.SpriteLibrary, UnityEngine.Animator, and UnityEngine.Rigidbody2D components.

[RequireComponent(typeof(SpriteRenderer))]
[RequireComponent(typeof(SpriteLibrary))]
[RequireComponent(typeof(Animator))]
[RequireComponent(typeof(Rigidbody2D))]
public abstract class Entity : MonoBehaviour, ICanAttack
